verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
So freely, flows the endless love You give to me;
So freely, not dependent on my part.
As I am reaching out reveal the love within Your heart,
As I am reaching out reveal the love within Your heart.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Completely, that's the way You give Your love to me,
Completely, not dependent on my part
As I am reaching out reveal the love within Your heart,
As I am reaching out reveal the love within Your heart.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So easy, I receive the love You give to me.
So easy, not dependent on my part
Flowing out to me the love within Your heart,
Flowing out to me the love within Your heart.
